00001 def roulette(pop, random):
00002     totalFitness = 0.0
00003     for ind in pop:
00004         totalFitness += ind.scalefit
00005     thresh = totalFitness * random.random()
00006     partSum = 0.0
00007 
00008     for ind in pop:
00009         partSum += ind.scalefit
00010         if partSum >= thresh:
00011             return ind
00012     return ind #If we never make it above the threshold, return last ind
